channel.title: Noob delphi question
channel.description:
hey, ive just started out with delphi, basicly i want to know how 2 save my program so that when i double click on it it runs (like an .exe file) its a simple hello world program. So like when u double click it it just loads strait up.
how would i do that?
-gary
